Rulings.Edison:
●Count the number of Neo-Spacian monsters you control with different names when Space Gift resolves.
●If you control a Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin when Space Gift resolves, you will draw 2 cards for it because its name is also treated as Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin.

Rulings.Base: 1. Count the number of "Neo-Spacian" monsters you control with different names when "Space Gift" resolves.\n2. If you control a "Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin" when "Space Gift" resolves, you will draw 2 cards for it because its name is also treated as "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin".
